SELECT count(1) FROM site WHERE NOT site_id = 'studio_root' AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM site WHERE site_id = #{siteId} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into site (site_uuid, site_id, name, description, status, deleted, last_commit_id, publishing_status_message, sandbox_branch, search_engine) values (#{siteUuid}, #{siteId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{status}, #{deleted}, #{lastCommitId}, #{publishingStatusMessage}, #{sandboxBranch}, #{searchEngine})
mapper.update: UPDATE site SET deleted = 1 WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE site SET last_commit_id = #{lastCommitId} WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(cs.node_last_commit_id, s.last_commit_id) FROM site s LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cluster c INNER JOIN cluster_site_sync_repo cssr ON c.id = cssr.cluster_node_id WHERE c.local_address = #{localAddress}) AS cs ON s.id = cs.site_id WHERE s.site_id = #{siteId} AND s.deleted = 0

SELECT IFNULL(cs.node_last_verified_gitlog_commit_id, s.last_verified_gitlog_commit_id) FROM site s LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM cluster c INNER JOIN cluster_site_sync_repo cssr ON c.id = cssr.cluster_node_id WHERE c.local_address = #{localAddress}) AS cs ON s.id = cs.site_id WHERE s.site_id = #{siteId} AND s.deleted = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM site WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM site WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM site WHERE name = #{name} AND deleted = 0
SELECT DISTINCT cs.site_id as siteid FROM site cs WHERE cs.system = 0 AND cs.deleted = 0 ORDER BY cs.site_id LIMIT #{start}, #{number}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cs.site_id) FROM site cs WHERE cs.system = 0 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY cs.site_id
mapper.update: UPDATE site SET publishing_enabled = #{enabled} WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE site SET publishing_status_message = #{message} WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE site SET last_verified_gitlog_commit_id = #{commitId} WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0

mapper.update: UPDATE site SET published_repo_created = 1 WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0

UPDATE site SET publishing_lock_heartbeat = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND deleted = 0;
